statements: SELECT META().xattrs.`_sync` from product where test_id='xattrs'
select meta().xattrs.`_sync`, meta().xattrs.`$document`.deleted, product is null as DELETED from product use keys ['product0_xattrs']
SELECT META().xattrs.`userAttr` from product where test_id='xattrs'
SELECT META().xattrs.`$document`.deleted from product where test_id='xattrs'
SELECT META().xattrs.`_sync` from product use keys ["product0_xattrs","product1_xattrs"]
SELECT META().xattrs.`$document`.deleted, META().xattrs.`userAttr` from product where test_id='xattrs'
select META().xattrs from product where test_id='xattrs'
SELECT META().xattrs.`_sync`.name,META().xattrs.`_sync`.id, name as product_name, price from product where test_id='xattrs'

statements: update product SET new_val = meta().xattrs.`_sync`.name where test_id='xattrs' returning meta().id,new_val
